param: a 5-digit code representing the type of pollutant you are looking for; e.g. PM2.5 = 88101, PM10 = 81102, ozone = 44201, carbon monoxide = 42101, sulfur dioxide = 42401, nitrogen dioxide = 42602
bdate: the begin time of the data selection, in yyyymmdd; e.g. 20100101
edate: the end time of the data selection, in yyyymmdd; e.g. 20211230
state: a 2-digit code representing the state you are looking for; e.g. California = 06
county: a 3-digit code representing the county you are looking for; e.g. Los Angeles = 037
